furnitures.name: Modern Wooden Dining Table
furnitures.description: A sleek and durable wooden dining table made from high-quality oak. Seats up to 6 people comfortably.

furnitures.name: Ergonomic Office Chair
furnitures.description: Breathable mesh backrest with adjustable lumbar support. Perfect for long working hours.

furnitures.name: Convertible Sofa Bed
furnitures.description: Stylish 3-seater sofa that easily converts into a queen-sized bed. Ideal for guests and compact spaces.

skinCare.name: Hydrating Facial Cleanser
skinCare.description: Gentle cleanser that removes dirt and hydrates skin for a soft, fresh feel.

skinCare.name: Anti-Aging Night Cream
skinCare.description: Nourishes skin overnight with retinol and collagen boosters.

skinCare.name: SPF 50 Sunscreen Lotion
skinCare.description: Broad-spectrum sunscreen suitable for all skin types.

hairCare.name: Strengthening Shampoo
hairCare.description: Infused with keratin to reduce hair breakage and promote shine.

hairCare.name: Moisturizing Conditioner
hairCare.description: Hydrates dry strands and makes hair easier to detangle.

hairCare.name: Hair Growth Serum
hairCare.description: Clinically tested serum that supports natural hair growth.

laptops.name: UltraBook 14
laptops.description: Slim, lightweight laptop with touch screen and fast SSD storage.

laptops.name: Gaming Laptop X99
laptops.description: High-performance laptop with RTX graphics and RGB keyboard.

laptops.name: Budget Laptop 15.6”
laptops.description: Affordable, full-sized laptop for everyday productivity and browsing.
